metadata.synopsis: This PAD oneliner is said when players have gotten the curse of Mystic Carrion's ancient lair by interacting with a secret door or picking up any object in the lair. Carrion is a mummy lord, so his lair is hostile to any living creatures, Astarion won't get affected.
metadata.how_to_trigger: oe roll amazingGo to CTY_Main_A -1390; 0; 75Interact with the door secret door there

0.speaker: Player
0.text: Feel that? This house doesn't want us here.
0.context: NodeContext: Kalarach: Resigned to more shenanigans
